name: Unmasking Tax Haven Operations
description: Revealing the hidden financial ecosystems that allow elite groups to evade taxation and launder illicit wealth.

cards.title: How Tax Havens Enable Financial Secrecy
cards.description: Examining the legal and extralegal mechanisms that protect illicit wealth.
bulletpoints: Understanding the role of jurisdictions like the Cayman Islands, Luxembourg, and the British Virgin Islands.
Identifying regulatory loopholes that allow asset shielding.
Mapping the relationship between elite banking and offshore entities.

cards.title: Shell Companies and Proxy Ownership
cards.description: Deciphering the use of legal entities to obscure ownership and facilitate corruption.
bulletpoints: Tracking beneficial ownership structures in offshore accounts.
Understanding the interplay between front companies and illicit finance.
Analyzing case studies of corporate shell games.

cards.title: Investigating Financial Leaks and Whistleblower Data
cards.description: Using leaked data to expose hidden tax havens and elite money movements.
bulletpoints: Examining the Panama Papers, Paradise Papers, and other major leaks.
Utilizing OSINT tools to track financial anomalies.
Coordinating investigative strategies to disrupt illicit financial networks.
